channel.title: Pikkabird Data Solutions
channel.description: Recent content on Pikkabird Data Solutions

item.title: About PikkaBird
item.description:
Welcome to my webstie My name is Joost Donkers and I started this page to explore managing website site content directly from the R programming language. The sites name is taken from the name of my consulting company Pikkabird Data Solutions, which has served me for many years. Furthermore its always good to have a catchy soundtrack during your day.
Thanks for reading!

item.title: Playing around
item.description: NMP data replication Taken data from a random table in NPM document in pdf format. Plotting in 2 different formats. First graph: Violin plots! Plot 2: Piramid plot En nu gekanteld En dan hier de conclusie

item.title: Embedding Interactive Widgets
item.description: Shiny Apps directly deployed. Below the shiny app that can be found on https://pbsolutions.shinyapps.io/Playground/ is embedded via knittr to work directly on this page. So does it work? So what else can be embedded Below an Iframe is embedded designed for display on Ghanaweb.com knitr::include_url("http://tech.ghanaweb.com/fortuneCity/widget.11.php") And now the same code <iframe src="http://tech.ghanaweb.com/fortuneCity/widget.11.php" id="FortuneCity_widget" frameborder="0" style="float:left; height: 324px; width: 300px; padding: 0; margin-bottom: 5px; margin-top:5px;" scrolling="no"></iframe> but now via direct html on the site
